World of Warcraft's Housing Feature Is Now Live, and Horde Players Are Desperately Trying to Reinvent Their Spiky Huts - IGN
articles.description: World of Warcraft's housing feature launched this week for everyone who purchased the upcoming Midnight expansion early. And Horde players in particular are really struggling to contend with one major issue: their house exteriors are ugly.

articles.title: tvOS 26.2 gets new RC for Apple TV 4K ahead of launch - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Apple has just debuted a revised RC (release candidate) build for tvOS 26.2, available both for developers and public beta users.
